main: ^Ah, there it is, the long-awaited package! Thank you, Alduin.
^Let me offer you some guidance on your journey. There are many ways to uncover the new totem's secrets.
choose: ^Which path would you like me to reveal?
a: ^The wizard path is unpredictable, nobody knowes what are there. Are you sure you want this?
b: ^bu rota çok tehlikeli işte çok zorlu bir parkur oldugu söyleniyor falan
c: ^bu rotanın güvenli oldugu fakat çook uzun oldugu söyleniyor
^o rotaya girip yıllarca gelmeyen dostlarımız oldu
^sırf risk almamak içinbu uzunyolu seçmek istediğine emin misin
aChosen: ^Very well, adventurer, your task is to take the unkown path. Good luck to you.
bChosen: ^Alright, adventurer, your mission is to follow the parkour route, dark and very dangerous. Best of luck.
cChosen: ^Okay, adventurer, your journey is to take the safe path, a slow but loooong route without conflict. Wishing you all the best.
